name: Brenda Smith
content: We use Deal Scale's automated postcard system for long-term farm area nurturing. The AI helps tailor messages based on time since last contact, and it's surprisingly effective for keeping our brand visible. The 'set it and forget it' aspect is fantastic.
problem: Maintaining consistent, non-intrusive contact with potential sellers in our target farm areas over many months or years was manually intensive.
solution: Deal Scale automates personalized postcard drops at strategic intervals. It’s a low-effort, high-impact way to stay top-of-mind, and the AI helps vary the messaging so it doesn’t feel repetitive.
